Author: throwrwayw
Text: yes!!! trying to work on remembering that i can control my attitude (sometimes) and that even though ED makes me feel like a bitch, i am not a bitch. hope you are doing alright this weekend 💖

Author: itsmebutprivate
Text: 21 College Senior here And I feel like I can slightly relate.  For me when this happens (especially game days) I feel like such a bitch.   Nothing is goes right, people keep offering me food (when like hello calories???), I hate just about every outfit, and I avoid my friends while st the party.    Then I usually end up shit faced not remembering most of the night.   It wasn’t until recently I realized my bratty “no one gets it, fuck everyone” is just me being pissed at my ED/mad I can’t enjoy things like everyone else.   But you can’t exactly get mad and say “fuck you ED” so it turns into “fuck you guys for not seeing I’m upset”.
